languages.text: "Я скрыла от тебя истину. Мне известно намного больше о тех, кто тревожит покой местной правительницы — в том числе и место, где они скрываются. Позволь мне указать тебе путь — с тем условием, что ты доставишь меня к ним".

traits.locale_text: Я врала. Я отведу тебя к бунтарям

languages.text: "I have hidden the truth from you. I know a great deal about those who are disturbing the peace of the local ruler, and I also know where they are hiding. Allow me to show you the way — on the condition that you bring me to them."
languages.original_text: "Я скрыла от тебя истину. Мне известно намного больше о тех, кто тревожит покой местной правительницы — в том числе и место, где они скрываются. Позволь мне указать тебе путь — с тем условием, что ты доставишь меня к ним".

traits.locale_text: "I have hidden the truth from you. I know a great deal about those who are disturbing the peace of the local ruler, and I also know where they are hiding. Allow me to show you the way — on the condition that you bring me to them."

"I have hidden the truth from you. I know a great deal about those who are disturbing the peace of the local ruler, and I also know where they are hiding. Allow me to show you the way — on the condition that you bring me to them."

"I have hidden the truth from you. I know a great deal about those who are disturbing the peace of the local ruler, and I also know where they are hiding. Allow me to show you the way — on the condition that you bring me to them."

"I have hidden the truth from you. I know a great deal about those who are disturbing the peace of the local ruler, and I also know where they are hiding. Allow me to show you the way — on the condition that you bring me to them."

languages.text: 「我は真実を隠していた。現地の支配者の平穏を乱している者たちをよく知っているし、その隠れ家も把握している。そこまでの道を教えよう…だが、我を共に連れて行くのが条件だ」
languages.original_text: "I have hidden the truth from you. I know a great deal about those who are disturbing the peace of the local ruler, and I also know where they are hiding. Allow me to show you the way — on the condition that you bring me to them."

traits.locale_text: 「我は真実を隠していた。現地の支配者の平穏を乱している者たちをよく知っているし、その隠れ家も把握している。そこまでの道を教えよう…だが、我を共に連れて行くのが条件だ」

languages.text: “有件事情我一直没有告诉过你。关于这颗行星上的那群叛乱分子，我对他们相当了解，我也知道他们藏在哪里，请允许我为你指路。不过，你得带我一起去找他们。”
languages.original_text: "I have hidden the truth from you. I know a great deal about those who are disturbing the peace of the local ruler, and I also know where they are hiding. Allow me to show you the way — on the condition that you bring me to them."

traits.locale_text: “有件事情我一直没有告诉过你。关于这颗行星上的那群叛乱分子，我对他们相当了解，我也知道他们藏在哪里，请允许我为你指路。不过，你得带我一起去找他们。”

languages.text: «Te he ocultado la verdad. Sé mucho acerca de los que perturban la paz de la gobernante local, y también dónde se ocultan. Permite que te muestre el camino... con la condición de que me lleves con ellos».
languages.original_text: "I have hidden the truth from you. I know a great deal about those who are disturbing the peace of the local ruler, and I also know where they are hiding. Allow me to show you the way — on the condition that you bring me to them."

traits.locale_text: «Te he ocultado la verdad. Sé mucho acerca de los que perturban la paz de la gobernante local, y también dónde se ocultan. Permite que te muestre el camino... con la condición de que me lleves con ellos».

languages.text: "Ich habe die Wahrheit vor Euch verborgen. Ich weiß viel über jene, die den Frieden der hiesigen Herrscherin stören, und ich weiß auch, wo sie sich verstecken. Gestattet mir, Euch den Weg zu zeigen – unter der Bedingung, dass Ihr mich zu ihnen bringt."
languages.original_text: "I have hidden the truth from you. I know a great deal about those who are disturbing the peace of the local ruler, and I also know where they are hiding. Allow me to show you the way — on the condition that you bring me to them."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe die Wahrheit vor Euch verborgen. Ich weiß viel über jene, die den Frieden der hiesigen Herrscherin stören, und ich weiß auch, wo sie sich verstecken. Gestattet mir, Euch den Weg zu zeigen – unter der Bedingung, dass Ihr mich zu ihnen bringt."

languages.text: « Je vous ai caché la vérité. Je sais beaucoup de choses au sujet de ceux qui perturbent la paix de la dirigeante locale, notamment où ils se cachent. Permettez-moi de vous montrer le chemin... à la condition que vous me conduisiez à eux. »
languages.original_text: "I have hidden the truth from you. I know a great deal about those who are disturbing the peace of the local ruler, and I also know where they are hiding. Allow me to show you the way — on the condition that you bring me to them."

traits.locale_text: « Je vous ai caché la vérité. Je sais beaucoup de choses au sujet de ceux qui perturbent la paix de la dirigeante locale, notamment où ils se cachent. Permettez-moi de vous montrer le chemin... à la condition que vous me conduisiez à eux. »

languages.text: "Gerçeği senden sakladım. Bölgenin hükümdarının huzurunu kaçıranlar hakkında bildiğim birçok şey var. Nerede saklandıklarını da biliyorum. Beni de onlara götürmen koşuluyla sana yolu göstereceğim."
languages.original_text: "I have hidden the truth from you. I know a great deal about those who are disturbing the peace of the local ruler, and I also know where they are hiding. Allow me to show you the way — on the condition that you bring me to them."

traits.locale_text: "Gerçeği senden sakladım. Bölgenin hükümdarının huzurunu kaçıranlar hakkında bildiğim birçok şey var. Nerede saklandıklarını da biliyorum. Beni de onlara götürmen koşuluyla sana yolu göstereceğim."
